title: training problem
body:
Hello.
i'm using visual genome as my custom dataset.
i followed all the steps as it says in here https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data

all requirements already installed

i have the images and labels folder : (i am using 200 images)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82616592-95a98980-9bc5-11ea-8157-e3e57e0e9e48.png)

example of the content of a label file :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82616770-1072a480-9bc6-11ea-8e4c-dc8aa2b1bf1e.png)

this is the content of my visualgenome_train.txt file (in /data)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82616943-8c6cec80-9bc6-11ea-9117-ea7a94754522.png)

my  visualgenome.names file contains 42 class names  

and my visualgenome.data looks like this : 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82617110-02715380-9bc7-11ea-83c2-4f495a8bd8e9.png)

also i modified the 3 yolo layers in  yolov3.cfg file to look like this : 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82617474-1073a400-9bc8-11ea-8e66-8f9970db97db.png)
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
when i train this happens : 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82617514-326d2680-9bc8-11ea-8e05-b5bc70ece2e2.png)

or it just crashes without displaying any error message. 

i'm confused right now  idk if i'm missing something.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EDIT : i got rid of empty lines in some files i thought maybe that could be the reason but i'm still getting this : 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58792456/82626637-39a02e80-9be0-11ea-9c14-57cbf1c600f1.png)
